metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento de la infección urinaria baja no complicada: dosis única de trimetoprim frente a 10 días con ácido pipemídico.
[The treatment of uncomplicated lower-urinary tract infection: a single dose of trimethoprim as opposed to 10 days with pipemidic acid].
